recipes.name: Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce

ingredients.name: Dark Brown Sugar
ingredients.preparation: Light can be used but isn't ideal

ingredients.name: Cider Vinegar
ingredients.preparation: Can use half if you don't like tart

directions: Mix chili powder, salt and pepper
In a large bowl mix ketchup, mustard, vinegar, Worcestershire, lemon juice, steak sauce, molasses, honey, hotsauce and brown sugar
Finely chop onion and garlic
Cook onions until translucent then add garlic and cook for ~1 min
Add dried spices and cook ~2 min until aromatic
Add wet ingredients and simmer for 15 min to thicken a bit
Taste and adjust; It may taste vinegary but this won't be as pronounced on the meat
Strain if you want to remove the onion and garlic chunks (or blend I guess)

recipes.name: Peach and Sweet Corn Salsa
directions: Boil corn then cut off cob and allow to cool
Cut peaches a similar size as corn nibblets
Bruoise shallot and garlic
Rough chop cilanto
Mix everything with lime juice together
Whisk everything together in a medium sauce pan
Bring to a boil; Reduce heat and simmer ~5 minutes
Cool
Blend everything together
Add water if it's too thick; more garlic if it needs it; sugar to balance; etc
I thought it was too vinegar heavy; use half then adjust (had to add water+sugar)

recipes.name: Sweet and Sour Sauce
directions: Heat oil in pan then add ketchup and sugar over low heat until large bubbles start to form
Stir in ginger, scallion and water
Add vinegar, salt and starch (disolve into a Tbsp of water first); Stir until thickened
Add in pork, chicke, tofu, etc
Cut and fry peppers until they turn dark red
Crush dried pepper in mortar
Add chili flakes, peppercorn and toasted sesame seeds to a bowl
Fry sliced ginger and onion on low heat until browned
Remove ginger and onion and add dried spices and dry until aromatic then remove
Pour ½ C of hot oil into the chili flakes and mix well
Turn up heat until almost smoking and then pour into chili flakes
Place in air tight container and wait 1-2 days until red colour
Put chili flakes, garlic, sesame seeds, garlic, ginger, scallion in a bowl and mix (first 5 ingredients)
Pour smoking hot oil on top and stir a bit
Add remaining ingredients and mix again
I opted to add the final Tbsp of sesame oil, but this is optional
I didn't toast the sesame seeds either and it was fine

recipes.name: Curry Roux
directions: Roast spices on non-stick pan (no oil) over low heat until fragrant (~5 min)
Melt butter in a seperate pan on low heat and add honey
Add flour and stir to combine until smooth (~15 min)
Add roasted spices to the roux
Once well combined remove from heat
Put in sealable container (line and wrap with cling wrap if desired); Place in fridge overnight
Portion (optional) and store in freezer

recipes.name: Lemon Mayo
directions: Mix
Part of Japanese McDonald's copycat Teriyaki burger (burger, sauces, lettuce only)

recipes.name: Tariyaki Sauce (Burger)
directions: Add everything except corn starch to saucepan and bring to a boil
Add corn starch and mix
When it comes back up to a boil and starts to thicken, turn off heat
Part of Japanese McDonald's copycat Teriyaki burger (burger, sauces, lettuce only)

recipes.name: Salad Dressing
directions: Grind seeds in morter; Mix
Similar-ish to restaurant salad dressing you get but better

recipes.name: Korean Fried Chicken Sauce
directions: Mix everything together

recipes.name: Gochujang Bibimbap Sauce
directions: Mix everything in together

recipes.name: Doenjang Bibimbap Sauce
directions: Mix everything together

recipes.name: Kid Bibimbap Sauce
directions: Mix everything together

recipes.name: Hollandaise
directions: Add everything except the butter to a double boiler and whisk until slightly thickened
Add cubed butter slowly
Add warm water (~1 tsp) if it's too thick
Should be just pourable

recipes.name: Caesar Dressing
directions: Mash garlic, then add everything but oil in a bowl or food processor
Slowly add oil while whisking
Add more Worstershire if needed; Add more/less cheese as needed

recipes.name: Romesco

ingredients.name: Tomatoes
ingredients.preparation: Cut a cross in skin to peel

directions: Drizzle some oil on garlic and tomatoes and roast at 350 about 45 min
If using bell pepper also roast
Remove garlic and pepper and roast tomatoes another 15 min or until they start to blacken
Toast bread and nuts in a pan or in the oven for ~5 min
Add peeled garlic, pepper, tomatoes to a blender and add salt
Blend and slowly drizze in oil until emulsified
Put the bread in with the vinegar to soften
Add bread, vinegar and nuts
It should be a bit grainy
